mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM weixin_message_template a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_message_template( id, template_id, template_code, title, primary_industry, deputy_industry, content, example, acct_open_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{templateId}, #{templateCode}, #{title}, #{primaryIndustry}, #{deputyIndustry}, #{content}, #{example}, #{acctOpenId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE weixin_message_template SET title = #{title}, primary_industry = #{primaryIndustry}, deputy_industry = #{deputyIndustry}, content = #{content}, example = #{example}, acct_open_id = #{acctOpenId} WHERE id = #{id}
